org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data

Class LCNModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data.LCNModule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LCNInputModule

    public abstract class LCNModule
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple (abstract) data class, which represents a LCN module and its current state. Defines some basic data structures, which are used by the LCNInputModule.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String firmware
      String containing the firmware of the module, is actually only read in special cases.
      int module
      The module address of the LCNModule.
      int outlet
      The outlet port of a module.
      int segment
      The segment address of the LCNModule.
      java.lang.String serial
      String containing the serial of the module, is actually only read in special cases.
      int status
      Status value, used for dim values etc..

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o,
             boolean soft,
             int homeSegment)
        Special comparison method, since modules have to be compared depending on their attributes.
        Parameters:
        o - The object to compare to.
        soft - True if the outlet should not be compared.
        homeSegment - the homeSegment to consider.
        Returns:
        True if the two objects are reasonably similar, false otherwise.
